title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Three-Stage Instructional Design for Enhancing Arabic-Korean Translation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher proficiency in Arabic and Korean, understanding of basic translation theory
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately translate Arabic texts into Korean by applying a three-stage instructional design (translation execution–comparative analysis–strategy discussion).
Learners can identify at least three key differences between ChatGPT’s translations and their own translations and perform critical analyses.
Learners can classify at least five types of potential AI translation tool errors and propose correction strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
